original_text: Yes, you are a God who hides yourself! You are Israel's God, our Saviour! Yes, you are a God who hides yourself! You are Israel's God, our Saviour! Yes, you are a God who hides yourself!
korean_text: 구원자 이스라엘의 하나님이여 진실로 주는 스스로 숨어 계시는 하나님이시니이다

sentences.original_text: Yes, you are a God who hides yourself!
You are Israel's God, our Saviour!
Yes, you are a God who hides yourself!
You are Israel's God, our Saviour!
Yes, you are a God who hides yourself!
